Billy Carlson
Work About Contact
Introduction

Billy Carlson is an Adjunct Lecturer at The Segal Design Institute. His is happy when he is designing for a greater purpose. Whether it’s creating ways for users to enjoy their experience more seamlessly or complete a task more efficiently, He always places the people at the center of what he creates.

Billy currently works as a Design Educator at Balsamiq, a design software company, where he helps designers and product folks learn best practices of all phases of UI and digital product design.
